column2: 1.  The Accused-Appellant (hereinafter referred to as the “Appellant”) has

column3: been indicted in the High Court of Kurunegala in High Court case no.
64/25. The charges in the indictment are as follows;
That  on  or  about  01.06.2008,  at  Agulgamuwa,  within

column4: jurisdiction  of  this  Court,  you  have  committed  the  offence  of
grave  sexual  abuse  on  a  minor,  who  was  less  than  16  years  of
age and thereby committed an offence punishable under section
365 B (2)(b) of the Penal Code as amended by Act No. 22 of 1995
